name: test_thinbackup_plugin
description:
arrange: given a Jenkins charm with thinbackup plugin installed and backup configured.
    act: when a backup action is run.
    assert: the backup is made on a configured directory.
descriptionHtml:
arrange: given a Jenkins charm with thinbackup plugin installed and backup configured.
act: when a backup action is run.
assert: the backup is made on a configured directory.
